Distributor: LK-TEL, Europa Diffusion [fr], New Films International, BMG Video, TriStar Pictures, 01 Distribuzione, EuropaCorp, Hollywood Classics
Production Co: Victor Company of Japan Ltd. (JVC) [jp], TF1 Films Productions, Canal+, EuropaCorp, Destiny [jp], Samitose Productions
Synopsis: When his former lover dies, a French policeman (Jean Reno) travels to Tokyo to take care of his estranged daughter (Ryôko Hirosue).
Title: Wasabi
